Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
Unit gains +{SwarmShieldAmount} when there is an adjacent friendly unit with Swarm Shield.
当附近存在带有族群护盾的友军时，单位将获得 {SwarmShieldAmount}。
Unit has +{SwarmShieldAmount} for being next to a unit with Swarm Shields.
当单位靠近带有族群护盾的单位时，将获得 {SwarmShieldAmount}。

Attempt to eat the target unit with a strength {DevourStrength} chance to kill it instantly and heal this unit for {HealAmount}. This unit also gains the [abilityblue]Spawn Larva[/abilityblue] ability.[br/]Only works on Light Biological or Cyborg units.[br/]This unit only gains [abilityblue]Spawn Larva[/abilityblue] if it devoured a non-Reinforcement unit.
尝试吞噬目标单位，有 {DevourStrength} 力量几率立即杀死目标，并使该单位治疗 {HealAmount}。此外，该单位还将获得[abilityblue]孵化幼虫[/abilityblue]技能。[br/]该技能仅对轻型生物或半机械人单位有效。[br/]如果吞噬的目标是非强化单位，则只会获得[abilityblue]孵化幼虫[/abilityblue]技能。
Strength {DevourStrength} chance to kill target instantly and heal this unit for {HealAmount}.[br/]Only works on Light Biological or Cyborg units.
有{DevourStrength}力量几率立即消灭目标，并使该单位获得{HealAmount}治疗。[br/]仅对生物单位和半机械人单位有效。
Strike the target with rending claws.

The unit gains [abilityblue]Universal Camouflage[/abilityblue] and is {CloakingAccuracyDecrease} harder to hit.[br/][br/]In addition, each time this unit is hit, it becomes {CloakingAccuracyDecreaseBuff} harder to hit for that turn. This effect can stack up to 3 times.[br/][br/][productioncol]Only one kind of carapace can be active at any time.[/productioncol]

单位获得[abilityblue]通用伪装[/abilityblue]且命中难度增加 {CloakingAccuracyDecrease}。[br/][br/]此外，该单位每次被击中后，该回合内的命中难度增加 {CloakingAccuracyDecreaseBuff}。该效果最多可叠加 3 次。[br/][br/][productioncol]一次只能激活一种甲壳。[/productioncol]

At the end of each turn, adjacent enemy units take {damage} damage, and there is a strength {poisonchance} chance of those units getting [abilityred]Poisoned[/abilityred].[br/][br/]If this unit dies, it explodes, dealing {PoisonExplosionDamage} to all adjacent units, with a strength {poisonchance} chance of applying [abilityred]Poisoned[/abilityred] to those units.

每回合结束时，相邻敌方单位会受到 {damage} 伤害，并且这些单位有 {poisonchance} 力量几率[abilityred]中毒[/abilityred]。[br/][br/]若中毒单位毒发身亡，会立地爆炸，带毒血肉溅向相邻单位，造成 {PoisonExplosionDamage} 伤害，并有 {poisonchance} 力量几率使被溅射到的单位[abilityred]中毒[/abilityred]。
Each successful attack of a unit with Frenzy will increase melee damage by {FrenzyMeleeIncrease}. This buff lasts for {FrenzyTurns}, and can stack up to {StackCap} times.
具备狂暴能力的单位在每次有效攻击后，近战攻击力将提升 {FrenzyMeleeIncrease}。这项增益可持续 {FrenzyTurns}，可最多叠加 {StackCap} 次。
This unit is in a frenzy and deals increased melee damage.
该单位处于狂暴状态，近战攻击力大涨。

This unit gains [abilityblue]Regeneration[/abilityblue], healing {AcceleratedHealthRegen}[hp/] each turn in combat, and recovers all of its [hp/] at the start of its owner's turn on the strategic map.[br/][br/][productioncol]Only one kind of carapace can be active at any time.[/productioncol]
该单位获得[abilityblue]再生[/abilityblue]，在战斗中每回合治疗 {AcceleratedHealthRegen}[hp/]，并在策略地图上其所有者的回合开始时，恢复全部 [hp/]。[br/][br/][productioncol]一次只能激活一种甲壳。[/productioncol]
If this unit is killed during tactical combat, it will revive after {SpareTurnRevive} with {SpareHealthRevive}.[br/][br/][firecol]A unit can only revive itself once per battle.[/firecol]
如果该单位在战术战斗中被击杀，可在 {SpareTurnRevive} 后复活，复活后血量为 {SpareHealthRevive}。[br/][br/][firecol]每个单位在每场战斗中只能复活自己一次。[/firecol]

This unit gains {ReflexAccuracyIncrease} increased accuracy. The unit also gains +{IncreaseStrategicVision} Strategic Vision Range and Detection, allowing it to see concealed units on the strategic map.
该单位获得 {ReflexAccuracyIncrease} 准度。此外，该单位还将获得 {IncreaseStrategicVision} 策略视野范围和“侦察”，使其可在策略地图中看见隐藏的单位。
This unit's melee attacks remove {armorDestroy} from their target with each strike.
该单位的每次近战攻击，可撕裂目标 {armorDestroy} 护甲。
每次攻击可摧毁 {armorDestroy} 护甲。

Melee attacks from this unit have a {StrengthChancePsiClaws}[strengthPsyche/] strength chance ({StrengthChancePsiClawsRepeating}[strengthPsyche/] for repeating attacks) to apply [abilityred]Concussion[/abilityred], [abilityred]Insanity[/abilityred], [abilityred]Panic[/abilityred], [abilityred]Catatonic[/abilityred] or [abilityred]Immobilize[/abilityred] at random to non-Mindless Biological or Cyborg units, for {ParasiticInfectionDuration}[turn/].

该单位的近战攻击有 {StrengthChancePsiClaws}[strengthPsyche/] 力量几率（重复攻击有 {StrengthChancePsiClawsRepeating}[strengthPsyche/] 几率）对非无意识生物和半机械人单位随机造成[abilityred]震荡[/abilityred]、[abilityred]错乱[/abilityred]、[abilityred]恐慌[/abilityred]、[abilityred]紧张[/abilityred]或[abilityred]无法移动[/abilityred]，持续 {ParasiticInfectionDuration}[turn/]。

Strength {InfectChance}[StrengthPsyche/] chance to apply either [abilityred]Concussion[/abilityred], [abilityred]Insanity[/abilityred], [abilityred]Panic[/abilityred], [abilityred]Catatonic[/abilityred] or [abilityred]Immobilize[/abilityred] to non-Mindless Biological or Cyborg units for {ParasiticInfectionDuration}[turn/].

有 {InfectChance}[StrengthPsyche/] 力量几率对非无意识生物单位和半机械人单位造成[abilityred]震荡[/abilityred]、[abilityred]错乱[/abilityred]、[abilityred]惊慌[/abilityred]、[abilityred]紧张[/abilityred]或[abilityred]无法移动[/abilityred]效果，持续{ParasiticInfectionDuration}[turn/]。
Spawns the devoured unit as a friendly larva.
将被吞噬的单位转化为友方的幼虫。
用锋利的利爪发动连续攻击。

The unit develops a unique metabolism, granting it [abilityblue]Skitter[/abilityblue], making it harder to hit the more it moves during its combat turn. Once per turn in tactical combat, this unit's action points are refilled after killing a unit.
该单位悟出独特的代谢能力，获得[abilityblue]飞掠者[/abilityblue]技能，在其战斗回合中，移动越多则命中难度越高。该单元在战术战斗中歼灭敌方单位后，可回复操作点数，每回合仅可恢复一次。
Kills refill action points once per turn.
击杀敌人可恢复操作点数，每回合只能触发一次。

Whenever the unit takes damage, they gain a stack of [abilityblue]Enraged[/abilityblue], granting the unit +{AdrenalMeleeDamage} melee damage, +{AdrenalAccuracy} accuracy and +{AdrenalCritical} critical hit chance per stack. This can stack up to {AdrenalStackMax} times. Enraged lasts for {AdrenalTurns}.
在每次受到攻击后，该单位会获得一层[abilityblue]暴怒[/abilityblue]，每层效果可获得 {AdrenalMeleeDamage} 近战攻击加成、{AdrenalAccuracy} 准度加成以及 {AdrenalCritical} 暴击率加成。该技能最多可叠加 {AdrenalStackMax} 次，持续 {AdrenalTurns}。
+{AdrenalDamage} 伤害、+{AdrenalAccuracy} 准度，+{AdrenalCritical} 暴击率。
用尖利的牙齿撕碎目标。
Fire a bomb that explodes in a cloud of blinding gas that lingers on the battlefield for {duration}.
发射一枚烟雾弹，在战场中制造障眼烟雾，可持续 {duration}。
This unit is {CloakingAccuracyDecrease} harder to hit.
该单位的命中难度增加 {CloakingAccuracyDecrease}。

Whenever this unit is struck by an attack, it gains +{ArmorReact}, for {ArmorReactTurn}. This effect can stack up to {NumStacks} times.[br/][br/][productioncol]Only one kind of carapace can be active at any time.[/productioncol]
只要该单位受到攻击，就会获得 +{ArmorReact}，持续 {ArmorReactTurn}。该效果最多可叠加 {NumStacks} 次。[br/][br/][productioncol]一次只能激活一种甲壳。[/productioncol]
该单位每次叠加可获得 {ArmorReact} 加成。
This unit's melee attacks deal +{IncreasedDamage} damage.
该单位的近战攻击造成 +{IncreasedDamage} 伤害。

In the text below, text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.
For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.
